title: State of Solana Q4 2025/2026
content: Solana's on-chain market structure experimenting with L1 vs L2 dynamics. SVM becoming a pluggable execution layer.

title: AI Agent API Empowerment
content: Enabled AI agents to generate and fund their own API keys via CLI. Focus on autonomous agentic commerce.

title: Developer Report Feb 2026
content: Solana leading in full-time developer growth. 83% increase in total devs since previous cycles. Focus on scalability and low cost.

title: ZK-Compression (Light Protocol)
content: Substantial reduction in storage costs via SNARKs. Crucial for state growth management in 2026.

title: DePIN-AI Synergy
content: Solana hosting 50+ DePIN projects (Helium, Grass, Hivemapper). DePIN viewed as foundational layer for AI infrastructure.
